front.title: Composite ML-DSA for use in X.509 Public Key Infrastructure

abstract.t: This document defines combinations of ML-DSA [FIPS.204] in hybrid with traditional algorithms RSASSA-PKCS1-v1.5, RSASSA-PSS, ECDSA, Ed25519, and Ed448. These combinations are tailored to meet regulatory guidelines. Composite ML-DSA is applicable in applications that uses X.509 or PKIX data structures that accept ML- DSA, but where the operator wants extra protection against breaks or catastrophic bugs in ML-DSA, and where EUF-CMA-level security is acceptable.
